name: White Chocolate Snack Mix
author: Sue
summary: Here is a sweet snack mix that is delicious and colorful. Saltiness and sweetness is the best combination! Don't be afraid of trying other cereals, candy or nuts. Salted almonds, granola, or, butterscotch chips would be fine substitutes or additions.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) package candy-coated milk chocolate pieces
directions: Line 3 baking sheets with waxed paper or parchment
In a large bowl, combine mini pretzels, toasted oat cereal,  crispy corn cereal squares, salted peanuts, and candy-coated chocolate pieces
In a microwave-safe bowl, heat chips and oil on medium-high for 2 minutes, stirring once
Microwave on high for 10 seconds; stir until smooth
Pour over cereal mixture and mix well
